messages.title: Sammy's Vision for Hemel
messages.content: I'm a Hemel girl, born and bred. I love this area, but like everyone else, I can see the things that need improving. I got involved in doing youth work many years ago, and am now a frontline youth worker. I see every day how cuts to local services have hit hardest those who need it most; how families struggle to cope when the benefits system fails them; and how crime is sneaking into many lives. These are the realities that prompted me to become a Dacorum Councillor for Highfield. Now I want to represent Hemel in Westminster.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: There should be faster and better access to mental support.
Wants to see better Youth Services so that young people have meaningful things to do, and can achieve their potential in safe and creative spaces.

Firmly believes we are in a climate crisis. Wants Hemel to be a beacon of good practice in protecting our future generations: EV charging points, better public transport, eco-friendly construction and protection of our green spaces.
Wants to support the thriving business sector in Hemel, make sure we all benefit. This means attracting new businesses, encouraging training links with education and promoting apprenticeship schemes.

issues.economy: Support the thriving business sector in Hemel.
issues.environment: Climate crisis. Wants Hemel to be a beacon of good practice in protecting our future generations.
issues.health: Physical health is important, thus better access to mental support.
issues.socialWelfare: Youth Services and local services support.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm a Hemel girl, born and bred. I love this area, but like everyone else, I can see the things that need improving.

politicalExperience.achievements: Became a Dacorum Councillor for Highfield.

images.caption: SAMMY BARRY - YOUR LIB DEM CANDIDATE FOR HEMEL
